entities.name: golden cup
entities.description: The golden cup is mentioned as a secret treasure of Lord Voldemort. It is described as being stolen and its loss is causing him great distress.

entities.name: Elder Wand
entities.description: The Elder Wand is a powerful magical object that is used by Lord Voldemort to kill the goblin and other wizards who are trying to escape.

entities.name: goblin
entities.description: A goblin is mentioned as being killed by the Elder Wand. It is described as kneeling and then rolling over dead.

entities.name: Bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix is a wizard who is trying to escape from Lord Voldemort's wrath. She is mentioned as throwing others behind her in her race for the door.

entities.name: Lucius Malfoy
entities.description: Lucius Malfoy is a wizard who is also trying to escape from Lord Voldemort's wrath. He is mentioned as throwing others behind him in his race for the door.

relationships.description: The golden cup is a secret treasure of Lord Voldemort, and its loss is causing him great distress.
The Elder Wand is used by Lord Voldemort to kill the goblin.
Bellatrix throws others behind her in her race for the door.
Lucius Malfoy throws others behind him in his race for the door.
